meanings.definition: A unit of magnetic flux density equal to one billionth of a tesla.
meanings.sent1: Scientists measured the magnetic field in nanotesla to understand its strength.
meanings.sent2: The device detected a magnetic field of 0.5 nanotesla.
meanings.sent3: The tiny magnet only produced a nanotesla of magnetic force.
meanings.sent4: The nanotesla of magnetic energy was barely noticeable but crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent5: Even a nanotesla change in the magnetic field can impact the results significantly.

meanings.definition: A measurement used in magnetometry to quantify the strength of a magnetic field.
meanings.sent1: The scientist recorded the magnetic field strength in nanotesla for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The magnetometer displayed a reading of 2 nanotesla.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the tiny number of nanotesla representing the magnetic power.
meanings.sent4: The nanotesla measurement revealed the true intensity of the magnetic field.
meanings.sent5: The fluctuation of just a nanotesla could indicate a significant change in the environment.
